content: NEW YORK  Aug 29 (Thomson Reuters Foundation) - Food and beverage companies face the risk of forced labor in countries where they obtain sugarcane but most fall short in efforts to tackle the problem that threatens millions of workers  according to a study released on Tuesday.
name: Monster Beverage Corporation
title: UPDATE 1-Cereal  drinks companies often overlook risk of forced labor in sugarcane - study
